column5: Been a bit. Hope Christmas went well and a Happy New Year. Things are good on this side. Hope to get  ice fishing soon and get together with friends  I haven't seen for sometime. An hope too make some new ones. We should have a meat and greet on Nipp again this ice season?
Glade to hear you are doing well.
Glad to see you back Tybo.
good to hear from you simcoe should be good for skîdoos in a week or so
Brian is taking you testing tomorrow! walk 20 feet behind him.
Happy to see you are back and doing well my friend...
No ice fishing for me Paul but looking forward to seeing you on our annual June trip to Nippissing as always.
Nice to have you back Paul ?
Hi Paul! Glad to hear you are ok. Take care and all the best!
Thanks guys. Should be a great ice season this year. Bought a second sled to help get other people out with me. So if you're looking to get out after the new year. Drop me a line.

Hey, hows it hanging back at ya Paul. Nice to hear from ya. Did a ice check today with Terry. Good to go Monday opener. Walking. If ya want to hook up, give me a shout. Oh, it,s a short walk. Remember the first time we ice fished ? LOL
Nice to hear from you again.

Paul..   Just doing a little catch up browsing and its so good to hear old time Pickering & O.F.Nrs  folk still around and better- Doing well! All the best to you & Jo this New Year from Charmaine and I in NewGlasgow,, NovaScotia.. Good luck with the new machine out on the ice and the coming soft water season..
Good to see you out and about Paul ! well there's a blast from the past brickNblock
